text: Chronicle of Flaming Years () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuliya Solntseva.ПОВЕСТЬ ПЛАМЕННЫХ ЛЕТФильмы достали из архивов It stars Boris Andreyev, Antonina Bogdanova, and Zinaida Kiriyenko. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuliya Solntseva
title: Chronicle of Flaming Years
